description: Manipulate the age of creatures you encounter.
name: Age Manipulation

talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of temporal energy that deals 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage, and reduces all of the target's stats by 9, 12, 13, 15, 16 for 3 turns.

At talent level 4 you may project a second bolt.

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Turn Back the Clock

talents.info_text: Reverts the minds of all creatures in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone to an infantile state, in effect confusing them (10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% to act randomly) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: Temporal Fugue Old

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 distortion of time, which deals 90, 122, 146, 167, 186 stacking temporal damage over 3 turns to all other creatures. The effect lasts 7, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns.

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ashes to Ashes

talents.info_text:
You revert your body to a previous state, healing yourself for 307, 416, 500, 572, 635 life and removing 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 physical status effects (both good and bad).

The amount of life healed will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Body Reversion

description: Spacetime anomalies that can randomly occur when paradox is to high.
name: anomalies

talents.info_text: Teleports up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 up to ten tiles away.
talents.name: Anomaly Rearrange

talents.info_text: Teleports up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 up to 16, 21, 29, 35, 40 tiles away.
talents.name: Anomaly Teleport

talents.info_text: You swap locations with a random target.
talents.message: @Source@ swaps places with a nearby target.
talents.name: Anomaly Swap

talents.info_text:
50% chance that damage the caster takes will be warped to a set target.

Once the maximum damage (26, 83, 161, 230, 293) is absorbed, the time runs out, or the target dies, the shield will crumble.
talents.message: @Source@ transfers damage to a nearby target.
talents.name: Anomaly Displacement Shield

talents.info_text: Creates a wormhole nearby and a second wormhole up to ten tiles away.
talents.message: @Source@ folds the space between two points.
talents.name: Anomaly Wormhole

talents.info_text: Allows up to five targets in a radius of 6, 10, 14, 16, 18 to travel up to 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 tiles through walls.
talents.message: @Source@ places several targets out of phase.
talents.name: Anomaly Probability Travel

talents.info_text: Up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 are teleporting 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 tiles every turn.
talents.name: Anomaly Blink

talents.info_text: Pulls innocent people into the fight.
talents.message: Some innocent bystanders have been teleported into the fight.
talents.name: Anomaly Summon Townsfolk

talents.info_text: Slows up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball by 7%, 12%, 18%, 23%, 27%.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a bubble of slow time.
talents.name: Anomaly Slow

talents.info_text: Increases global speed of up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball by 7%, 12%, 18%, 23%, 27%.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a bubble of fast time.
talents.name: Anomaly Haste

talents.info_text: Stuns up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball.
talents.message: @Source@ creates a bubble of nul time.
talents.name: Anomaly Stop

talents.info_text: Time Prisons up to five targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Bubble

talents.info_text: Time Shields up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Shield

talents.info_text: Invigorates up to five targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Invigorate

talents.info_text: Clones a random creature within range.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Clone

talents.info_text: Creates a temporal storm for 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 to 2, 2, 4, 5, 6 turns that deals between 3.33, 6.18, 10, 14, 17 and 10, 19, 30, 41, 50 temporal damage each turn.
talents.name: Anomaly Temporal Storm

talents.info_text: Increases localized gravity, pulling in targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Gravity Pull

talents.info_text: Digs out all terrain in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball.
talents.name: Anomaly Dig

talents.info_text: Entombs a single target in a wall of stone.
talents.name: Anomaly Entomb

talents.info_text: Places between three and six talents of up to 5 targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball on cooldown for up to 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Entropy

talents.info_text: Creates a gravity well in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball, pinning up to five targets.
talents.name: Anomaly Gravity Well

talents.info_text: Causes an earthquake in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4.
talents.name: Anomaly Quake

talents.info_text: Reduces the resistances of up to five targets in a ball of radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 by 8%, 14%, 23%, 31%, 38%.
talents.message: @Source@ crumbles the resistances of several targets.
talents.name: Anomaly Flawed Design

talents.info_text: Summons three to six dust storms.
talents.name: Anomaly Dust Storm

talents.info_text: Summons three to six blazing fires.
talents.name: Anomaly Blazing Fire

talents.info_text: Turns up to 5 targets in a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 ball to stone for 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Calcify

talents.info_text: Teleports between 3 and 6 targets to the caster.
talents.name: Anomaly Call

talents.info_text: Substantially toughens and hastes one target for 3, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
talents.name: Anomaly Deus Ex

talents.info_text: Clones the caster.
talents.message: @Source@'s evil twin has come from another timeline.
talents.name: Anomaly Evil Twin

talents.info_text: Clones all creatures in a radius of 10.
talents.message: @Source@ has caused two threads to merge.
talents.name: Anomaly Intersecting Threads

talents.info_text: Digs out all terrain in between three and six radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 balls.
talents.name: Anomaly Mass Dig

talents.info_text: Summons a sphere of destruction.
talents.name: Anomaly Sphere of Destruction

talents.info_text: Summons three to six tornados.
talents.name: Anomaly Tornado

talents.info_text: Causes a meteor to fall from the sky.
talents.message: @Source@ causes a meteor to fall from the sky.
talents.name: Anomaly Meteor

talents.info_text: Tears a hole in the fabric of spacetime.
talents.message: @Source@ tears a hole in the fabric of spacetime.
talents.name: Anomaly Spacetime Tear

talents.info_text: Time elementals have been attracted to the timeline.
talents.message: Some Time Elementals have been attracted by @Source@'s meddling.
talents.name: Anomaly Summon Time Elemental

description: A blend of chronomancy and dual-weapon combat.
name: Blade Threading

talents.info_text:
Attack the target with your melee weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157%.

If the attack hits you'll warp the target, dealing 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 temporal and 11, 22, 30, 37, 43 physical damage, and may stun, blind, pin, or confuse them for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The bonus damage improves with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Warp Blade

talents.info_text:
Folds a single dimension of your weapons (or ammo) upon itself, adding 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 temporal damage to your strikes and increasing your armour penetration by 11, 21, 29, 36, 42.

The armour penetration and damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Weapon Folding

talents.info_text:
Attack your foes in a frontal arc, doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage. If two or more targets are hit you'll braid their lifelines for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Braided targets take 100%, 135%, 163%, 186%, 207% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The damage transfered by the braid effect scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Braided Blade

talents.info_text:
Attack the target with your melee weapons for 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% damage. If the attack hits you'll teleport next to up to 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 random enemies, attacking for 90%, 103%, 112%, 121%, 128% damage.

Temporal Assault can hit the same target multiple times and at talent level five you get an additional teleport.
talents.name: Temporal Assault

description: A blend of chronomancy and ranged combat.
name: Bow Threading

talents.info_text:
Your weapons and ammo hit with greater force, dealing an additional 22, 44, 60, 73, 85 physical damage and having a 11%, 21%, 25%, 25%, 25% chance to daze on hit.

The daze chance and damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Impact

talents.info_text:
Fire a shot doing 166%, 189%, 207%, 222%, 235% temporal damage. If the arrow hits you recover 11, 14, 17, 20, 22 Paradox.

This attack does not consume ammo.
talents.name: Threaded Arrow

talents.info_text:
Fire a shot doing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage. When the arrow reaches its destination it will draw in creatures in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 and inflict 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 physical damage.

Each target moved beyond the first deals an additional 50, 67, 81, 93, 103 physical damage (up to 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The additional damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Singularity Arrow

talents.info_text:
Fire upon the target for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage and summon up to 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 temporal clones (depending on available space).

These clones are out of phase with normal reality and deal 50% damage but shoot through friendly targets.

At talent level three and five you can summon an additional clone.
talents.name: Arrow Stitching

description: Allows you to glimpse the future, or become more aware of the present.
name: Chronomancy

talents.info_text:
You peer into the future, sensing creatures and traps in a radius of 22, 26, 30, 32, 35 for 6, 9, 12, 14, 16 turns.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight bonuses) while Precognition is active.

The detection radius will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Precognition

talents.info_text:
Gain 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 defense and 11%, 14%, 17%, 19%, 21% chance to shrug off critical hits.

If you have Precognition or See the Threads active these bonuses will be added to those effects, granting additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits.

These bonuses scale with your Magic stat.
talents.name: Foresight

talents.info_text:
Choose an activatable spell that's not targeted. When you take damage that reduces your life below 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% the spell will automatically cast.

This spell will cast even if it is currently on cooldown, will not consume a turn or resources, and uses the talent level of Contingency or its own, whichever is lower.

This effect can only occur once every 50 turns and takes place after the damage is resolved.

Current Contingency Spell: None
talents.name: Contingency

talents.info_text:
You peer into three possible futures, allowing you to explore each for 11, 17, 21, 25, 28 turns. When the effect expires, you'll choose which of the three futures becomes your present.

If you know Foresight you'll gain additional defense and chance to shrug off critical hits (equal to your Foresight values) while See the Threads is active.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

If you die in any thread you'll revert the timeline to the point when you first cast the spell and the effect will end.

This spell may only be used once per zone level.
talents.name: See the Threads

description: Manipulate raw energy by addition or subtraction.
name: energy

talents.info_text:
Partially dissipates all incoming damage, reducing it by 30%, up to a maximum of 100, 135, 163, 186, 207.

The maximum damage reduction will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Energy Decomposition

talents.info_text:
You sap the target's energy and add it to your own, placing up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 random talents on cooldown for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns.

For each talent put on cooldown, you reduce the cooldown of one of your chronomancy talents currently on cooldown by 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns and deal 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 temporal damage to the target.

The damage done will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Energy Absorption

talents.info_text: For the next 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns chronomancy spells with a cooldown of 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 or less have a cooldown of one.
talents.name: Redux

talents.info_text:
Over the next 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns all beneficial timed effects on the target tick twice as fast.

Each timed effect affected by this talent deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 temporal damage to the target.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Entropy

description: Manipulate the threads of fate.
name: Fate Threading

talents.info_text:
Disentangle the timeline, reducing your Paradox by 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 and creating an anomaly. This spell will never produce a major anomaly.

Additionally you recover 17%, 42%, 62%, 77%, 89% more Paradox from random anomalies (217%, 242%, 262%, 277%, 289% total).

The Paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Disentangle

talents.info_text:
While active, 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of all damage you take increases your Paradox by 47%, 34%, 28%, 25%, 22% of the damage absorbed over 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

The amount of Paradox damage you recieve will be reduced by your Spellpower.
talents.name: Preserve Pattern

talents.info_text:
Deals 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 temporal damage over 4 turns to all other targets in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2. If the target is slain before the effect expires you'll recover 2, 5, 7, 10, 13 Paradox.

If the target is hit by an Anomaly the remaining damage will be done instantly.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Trim Threads

talents.info_text:
You've learned to focus most anomalies when they occur and may choose the target area with 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% probability.

You also may bias the type of anomaly effects you produce with 24%, 55%, 68%, 75%, 80% probability.

Additionally random anomalies only cost you 75%, 44%, 31%, 24%, 19% of a turn rather than a full turn when they occur.

Major anomalies, those occuring when your modified Paradox is over 600, are not affected by this talent.
talents.name: Bias Weave

description: Weave the threads of fate.
name: Fate Weaving

talents.info_text:
Each time you take damage from someone else you gain one spin, increasing your defense and saves by 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 for three turns.

This effect may occur once per turn and stacks up to three spin (for a maximum bonus of 9, 15, 21, 27, 30).
talents.name: Spin Fate

talents.info_text:
Activate to remove pins and stuns. You also gain 24%, 28%, 31%, 32%, 33% pin and stun immunity for 5 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active these bonuses will be increased by 33% per spin (up to a maximum of 49%, 57%, 62%, 65%, 67%).

While Webs of Fate is active you may gain one additional spin per turn. These bonuses will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Webs of Fate

talents.info_text:
When Spin Fate is triggered you reduce the triggering damage by 25%, 28%, 30%, 31%, 32%.

This effect scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fateweaver

talents.info_text:
Activate to Seal Fate for 5 turns. When you damage a target while Seal Fate is active you have a 50% chance to increase the duration of one detrimental status effect on it by one turn.

If you have Spin Fate active the chance twill be increased by 33% per Spin (to a maximum of 100% at three Spin.)

This can occur at most 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 times per turn. While Seal Fate is active you may gain one additional spin per turn.
talents.name: Seal Fate

description: Call upon the force of gravity to crush, push, and pull your foes.
name: gravity

talents.info_text:
Sends out a blast wave of gravity in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 base physical damage and knocking back targets caught in the area.

Targets knocked into walls or other targets take 50% additional damage and deal 50% damage to targets they're knocked into.

Closer targets will be knocked back further and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Blast

talents.info_text:
Creates a gravity spike in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 that moves all targets towards the spell's center and inflicts 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 physical damage.

Each target moved beyond the first deals an additional 50, 67, 81, 93, 103 physical damage (up to 199, 269, 324, 371, 412 bonus damage).

Targets take reduced damage the further they are from the epicenter (20% less per tile).

The damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Spike

talents.info_text:
Create a gravity field around you that slows incoming projectiles by 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56% and protects you from all gravity effects.

While this spell is active creatures that hit you in melee combat will take 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage and have their knockback resistance reduced by half for two turns.

The projectile slowing and damage will scale with your spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Locus

talents.info_text:
Increases local gravity in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, dealing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage and slowing the movement speed of all affected targets by 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56%.

The damage done will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Gravity Well

description: Change and shape matter itself.
name: matter

talents.info_text:
Fires a beam that turns matter into dust, inflicting 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dust to Dust

talents.info_text:
Fragile spikes of carbon protrude from your flesh, clothing, and armor, increasing your armor rating by 32, 44, 53, 60, 67 and inflicting 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 bleed damage over six turns on attackers. Each time you're struck, the armor increase will be reduced by 1. Each turn the spell will regenerate 1 armor up to its starting value.

If the armor increase from the spell ever falls below 1, the sustain will deactivate and the effect will end.

The armor and bleed damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Carbon Spikes

talents.info_text:
Destabilizes the target, inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage per turn for 10 turns. If the target dies while destabilized, it will explode, doing 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal damage and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical damage in a radius of 4.

If the target dies while also under the effects of continuum destabilization, all explosion damage will be done as temporal damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Destabilize

talents.info_text:
Attempts to pull the target apart at a molecular level, inflicting 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 temporal damage and 103, 140, 168, 192, 213 physical damage. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Quantum Spike deals 50% additional damage to targets affected by temporal destabilization and/or continuum destabilization.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Quantum Spike

description: Miscellaneous Chronomancy effects.
name: Other

talents.info_text:
Lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 that teleport enemies to you and inflict 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 physical and 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (0 detection and 1 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 2 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.

Using this talent will trigger the cooldown on Warp Mine Away.
talents.name: Warp Mine Toward

talents.info_text:
Lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 that teleport enemies away from you and inflict 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 physical and 2.68, 4.09, 6.47, 8.89, 11 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (0 detection and 1 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 2 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.

Using this talent will trigger the cooldown on Warp Mine Away.
talents.name: Warp Mine Away

talents.info_text:
Use to set your preferred Paradox. While resting or waiting you'll adjust your Paradox towards this number over 19, 18, 15, 13, 10 turns.

The time it takes you to adjust your Paradox scales down with your Spellpower to a minimum of 10 turns.

Preferred Paradox : 0

Spellpower for Chronomancy : 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

Willpower Paradox Modifier : -20, -50, -100, -150, -200

Paradox Sustain Modifier : +0

Total Modifed Paradox : 280, 250, 200, 150, 100

Current Anomaly Chance : 0%
talents.name: Spacetime Tuning

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 114, 155, 186, 213, 236 temporal damage, and attempts to stun all creatures in a radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 ball for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Stop

talents.info_text:
Creates a time distortion in a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3 that lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns, decreasing global speed by 60% for 3 turns and inflicting 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 temporal damage each turn to all targets within the area.

The slow effect and damage dealt will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Slow

talents.info_text: Your mastery of spacetime reduces the cooldown of Banish, Dimensional Step, Swap, and Temporal Wake by 1, 3, 4, 5, 5, and the cooldown of Wormhole by 3, 6, 8, 10, 11. Also improves your Spellpower for purposes of hitting targets with chronomancy effects that may cause continuum destabilization (Banish, Time Skip, etc.), as well as your chance of overcoming continuum destabilization, by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.
talents.name: Spacetime Mastery

talents.info_text:
By slightly reorganizing history, you reduce your Paradox by 135, 183, 220, 251, 279 and temporarily stabilize the timeline; this allows chronomancy to be used without chance of failure for 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns (backfires and anomalies may still occur).

The paradox reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Static History

talents.info_text:
You've learned to boost your magic through your control over the spacetime continuum. Increases your Magic and your Spell Save by 11, 16, 19, 23, 26.

The effect will scale with your Willpower.
talents.name: Quantum Feed

talents.info_text:
You pull your awareness fully into the moment, increasing your stealth detection, see invisibility, defense, and accuracy by 5, 9, 12, 15, 17 for 4, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

If you have Spin Fate active when you cast this spell, you'll gain a bonus to these values equal to 50% of your spin.

This spell takes no time to cast.
talents.name: Moment of Prescience

talents.info_text:
You begin to gather energy from other timelines. Your Spellpower will increase by 11, 21, 29, 37, 45 on the first turn and 1.83, 3.46, 4.88, 6.20, 7.43 more each additional turn.

The effect ends either when you cast a spell, or after five turns.

Eacn turn the effect is active, your Paradox will be reduced by 4, 8, 12, 15, 18.

This spell will not break Spacetime Tuning, nor will it be broken by activating Spacetime Tuning.
talents.name: Gather the Threads

talents.info_text:
You encase yourself in a field that slows incoming projectiles by 41%, 53%, 62%, 69%, 76%, and increases your physical resistance by 20%, 26%, 31%, 34%, 38%.

The effect will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Entropic Field

talents.info_text:
You partially remove yourself from the timeline for 10 turns.

This increases your resistance to all damage by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66%, reduces the duration of all detrimental effects on you by 32%, 39%, 43%, 47%, 49%, and reduces all damage you deal by 20%.

The resistance bonus, effect reduction, and damage penalty will gradually lose power over the duration of the spell.

The effects scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fade From Time

talents.info_text:
You summon your future self to fight alongside you for 4, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns. At some point in the future, you'll be pulled into the past to fight alongside your past self after the initial effect ends.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.
talents.name: Paradox Clone

talents.info_text: You bend space around you, displacing 6%, 10%, 13%, 15%, 16% of any damage you receive onto a random enemy within range.
talents.name: Displace Damage

talents.info_text:
You surround yourself with a radius 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 distortion of gravity, knocking back and dealing 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 physical damage to all creatures inside it. The effect lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns. Deals 50% extra damage to pinned targets, in addition to the knockback.

The blast wave may hit targets more then once, depending on the radius and the knockback effect.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Repulsion Field

talents.info_text:
Clones the target creature for up to 6, 8, 10, 12, 13 turns. The duration of the effect will be divided by half the target's rank, and the target will have have 52%, 56%, 60%, 62%, 65% of its normal life and deal 47%, 43%, 39%, 37%, 34% less damage.

If you clone a hostile creature the clone will target the creature it was cloned from.

The life and damage penalties will be lessened by your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Clone

talents.info_text: You've learned to focus your control over the spacetime continuum, and quell anomalous effects. Increases your effective Willpower for anomaly calculations by 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58%.
talents.name: Paradox Mastery

talents.info_text:
You convert 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% of all non-temporal damage you receive into temporal damage spread out over 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

This damage will bypass resistance and affinity.
talents.name: Damage Smearing

talents.info_text:
Randomly teleports all targets within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 around you. Targets will be teleported between 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 and 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 tiles from their current location.

If no targets are teleported the cooldown will be halved.

The chance of teleportion will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Banish

talents.info_text:
You manipulate the spacetime continuum in such a way that you switch places with another creature with in a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. The targeted creature will be confused (power 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%) for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The spell's hit chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Swap

talents.info_text:
Violently fold the space between yourself and another point within range.

You teleport to the target location, and leave a temporal wake behind that stuns for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and deals 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical warp damage to targets in the path.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Wake

description: Mastery of folding points in space.
name: Spacetime Folding

talents.info_text:
Learn to lay Warp Mines in a radius of 1 out to a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10.

Warp Mines teleport targets that trigger them either toward you or away from you depending on the type of mine used and inflict 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 physical and 68, 92, 110, 126, 140 temporal (warp) damage.

The mines are hidden traps (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and last for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage caused by your Warp Mines will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Warp Mines

talents.info_text:
You fold the space between yourself and a second point within a range of 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, creating a pair of wormholes. Any creature stepping on either wormhole will be teleported near the other (radius 6, 4, 3, 2, 2 accuracy).

The wormholes will last 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns and must be placed at least two tiles apart.

The chance of teleporting enemies will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Wormhole

talents.info_text:
Tethers the target to the location for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. For each tile the target moves away from the target location it has a 16%, 19%, 20%, 21%, 22% chance each turn of being teleported back to the tether.

The teleportation chance scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Spatial Tether

talents.info_text:
Create a radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 anti-telport field for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Enemies in the field will be anchored, preventing teleportation and taking 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 physical and 78, 106, 127, 146, 162 temporal (warp) damage on teleport attempts.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dimensional Anchor

description: Weave the threads of spacetime.
name: Spacetime Weaving

talents.info_text:
Teleports you to up to 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 tiles away, to a targeted location in line of sight.

At talent level 5 you may swap positions with a target creature.
talents.name: Dimensional Step

talents.info_text: When you teleport you reduce the duration of up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 detrimental effects by 2, 3, 4, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Dimensional Shift

talents.info_text: Phase shift yourself for 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns; any damage greater than 10% of your maximum life will teleport you to an adjacent tile and be reduced by 50% (can only happen once per turn).
talents.name: Phase Shift

talents.info_text:
When you teleport with Phase Pulse active you deal 23, 31, 37, 42, 47 physical and 23, 31, 37, 42, 47 temporal (warp) damage to all targets in a radius of 1, 2, 3, 3, 4 around you.

For each space you move from your original location the damage is increased by 10% (to a maximum bonus of 100%). If the teleport fails, the blast radius and damage will be doubled.

This effect occurs both at the entrance and exist locations and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Phase Pulse

description: Manipulate topological defects in the fabric of spacetime.
name: Spatial Tears

talents.info_text:
Fire three Spatial Fragments at the target that each inflict 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 physical and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 temporal (warp) damage. If you target yourself you'll instead fire one Spatial Fragment at up to three targets within range.

If Fractured Space is fully charged the projectiles will be able to pierce through targets. This will consume your Fractured Space charges.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Spatial Fragments

talents.info_text:
Create a void wall of length 3, 5, 7, 7, 9 that lasts 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. Each turn the wall deals 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 physical and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 temporal (warp) damage to all enemies within a radius of 1.

If Fractured Space is fully charged the wall will block movement, but not sight or projectiles. This will consume your Fractured Space charges.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Discontinuity

talents.info_text:
Each time you deal warp damage Fractured Space gains one charge, up to a maximum of six charges. If you're not generating charges one charge will decay every other turn.

Each charge increases warp damage by 2%, 4%, 5%, 6%, 6% and gives your Warp damage a 4%, 9%, 11%, 12%, 13% chance to stun, blind, pin, or confuse affected targets for 3 turns.

If Fractured Space is fully charged, your Spatial Tears talents will consume them when cast and have bonus effects (see indvidual talent descriptions).

Current damage bonus: 0%

Current effect chance: 0%
talents.name: Fractured Space

talents.info_text:
Create a Sphere of Destruction that travels towards the target location, inflicting 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 physical and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 temporal (warp) damage in a radius of three.

If Fractured Space is fully charged the Sphere will remove a single sustain from targets it damages. This will consume your Fractured Space charges.

The sphere can hit a single target multiple times in one turn and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Sphere of Destruction

description: Control how fast objects and creatures move through spacetime.
name: Speed Control

talents.info_text: When you move you gain 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35% movement speed for one turn. This effect stacks up to three times.
talents.name: Celerity

talents.info_text:
Time Dilates around you, reducing the speed of all enemies within a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 by up to 33%, 38%, 41%, 43%, 44%. This effect builds gradually over three turns and loses 11%, 12%, 13%, 14%, 14% power each time you move.

Movement via teleport will not lower the power and the speed decrease will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Dilation

talents.info_text:
Increases your movement speed by 11%, 12%, 13%, 14%, 14% per stack of Celerity and your attack, spell, and mind speed by 11%, 12%, 13%, 14%, 14% per stack of Time Dilation for the next 4 game turns.

The speed increase will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Haste

talents.info_text:
Gain 2 turns. During this time your damage will be reduced by 66%, 61%, 58%, 56%, 55%.

Time must be fully dilated in order to use this talent.

The damage reduction penalty will be lessened by your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Stop

description: Manipulate chronomantic spells.
name: Spellbinding

talents.info_text:
Empowers the selected chronomancy spell, increasing spellpower when casting it by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

Current Empowered Spell: None
talents.name: Empower

talents.info_text:
Extends the duration of the selected chronomancy spell by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Current Extended Spell: None
talents.name: Extension

talents.info_text:
Reduces the cooldown of the selected chronomancy spell by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Current Matrix Spell: None
talents.name: Matrix

talents.info_text:
Reduces the casting speed of the selected chronomancy spell by 15%, 31%, 43%, 51%, 57%.

Current Quickened Spell: None
talents.name: Quicken

description: Warden combat training and techniques.
name: Temporal Guardian

talents.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using swords, axes, maces, knives, or bows.

You now also use your Magic in place of Strength when equipping weapons, calculating weapon damage, and physical power.

These bonuses override rather than stack with weapon mastery, knife mastery, and bow mastery.
talents.name: Strength of Purpose

talents.info_text:
For the next 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns, you recover 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 life per turn and most other talents on cooldown will refresh twice as fast as usual.

The amount healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Invigorate

talents.info_text:
When a single hit deals more than 37%, 30%, 26%, 23%, 21% of your maximum life another you appears and takes 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56% of the damage as well as 20%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 28% of all other damage you take for the rest of the turn.

The clone is out of phase with this reality and deals 50% less damage but its arrows will pass through friendly targets. After 2 turns it returns to its own timeline.

This effect can only occur once per turn and the amount of damage split scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Guardian Unity

talents.info_text:
Attack the target with either your bow or melee weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% damage.

If the attack hits you'll breach the target's immunities, reducing armor hardiness, stun, pin, blindness, and confusion immunity by 50% for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Breach chance scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Breach

description: Call temporal hounds to aid you in combat.
name: Temporal Hounds

talents.info_text:
Upon activation summon a Temporal Hound. Every 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns another hound will be summoned, up to a maximum of three hounds. If a hound dies you'll summon a new hound in 35, 21, 17, 15, 14 turns.

Your hounds inherit your increased damage percent and have 9%, 16%, 21%, 25%, 28% physical resistance and 38%, 67%, 87%, 100%, 100% temporal resistance.

Hounds will get, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Strength, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Dexterity, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Constitution, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Magic, 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Willpower, and 76, 100, 118, 133, 147 Cunning ,based on your Spellpower.

While Temporal Hounds is active your arrows will shoot through friendly targets.
talents.name: Temporal Hounds

talents.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to teleport to the targeted location. If you target a creature with this effect your hounds will set that creature as their target.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 defense and 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% resist all after any teleport.

At talent level five, if you're not at your maximum number of hounds when you cast this spell a new one will be summoned.

The teleportation bonuses scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Command Hounds: Blink

talents.info_text:
Your hounds can now survive for up to 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns after their hit points are reduced below 1. While in this state they deal 50% less damage but are immune to additional damage.

Command Blink will now regenerate your hounds for 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 life per turn and increase their global speed by 40%, 47%, 51%, 54%, 56% for five turns. Hounds below 1 life when this effect occurs will have the bonuses doubled.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% stun, blind, confusion, and pin resistance.

The regeneration and haste effects scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Vigour

talents.info_text:
Command your Temporal Hounds to breathe time, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage and reducing the stats of all targets in a radius 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 cone.

Affected targets will have their stats reduced by 9, 12, 13, 15, 16 for 3 turns. You are not immune to the breath of your own hounds, but your hounds are immune to stat damage from other hounds.

When you learn this talent, your hounds gain 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% temporal damage affinity.
talents.name: Command Hounds: Breathe

description: A blend of ranged and dual-weapon combat.
name: Threaded Combat

talents.info_text:
Your Weapon Folding and Impact spells now deal an additional 70%, 77%, 81%, 83%, 85% damage in a radius of 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

The damage percent will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frayed Threads

talents.info_text:
Attack with your bow or dual-weapons for 155%, 170%, 181%, 191%, 199% damage.

If you use your bow you'll shoot a beam and each target hit will reduce the cooldown of one Blade Threading spell currently on cooldown by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

If you use your dual-weapons you'll attack all targets within a radius of one around you and each target hit will reduce the cooldown of one Bow Threading spell currently on cooldown by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2.

At talent level five cooldowns are reduced by two.
talents.name: Thread the Needle

talents.info_text:
Your Bow Threading and Blade Threading spells now deal 23%, 28%, 31%, 33%, 34% more weapon damage if you did not have the appropriate weapon equipped when you initated the attack.

The damage percent will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blended Threads

talents.info_text:
Summons a blade warden and a bow warden from an alternate timeline for 6, 8, 10, 12, 13 turns. The wardens are out of phase with this reality and deal 44%, 41%, 39%, 38%, 37% less damage but the bow warden's arrows will pass through friendly targets.

Each warden knows all Threaded Combat, Temporal Guardian, and Blade Threading or Bow Threading spells you know.

The damage penalty will be lessened by your Spellpower.
talents.name: Twin Threads

description: Examine and alter the timelines that make up the spacetime continuum.
name: Timeline Threading

talents.info_text:
Rethread the timeline, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 temporal damage to the target before moving on to a second target.

Rethread can hit up to 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Rethread

talents.info_text:
For the next 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns two alternate versions of you enter your timeline. While the effect is active all damage done by you or your copies is reduced by two thirds and all damage recieved is split between the three of you.

Temporal Fugue does not normally cooldown while active. You may take direct control of your clones.
talents.name: Temporal Fugue

talents.info_text:
Your Rethread now braids the lifelines of all targets it hits for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. Braided targets take 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52% of all damage dealt to other braided targets.

The amount of damage shared will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Braid Lifelines

talents.info_text:
Over the next 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, you attempt to remove the target from the timeline, lowering all its resistance by 38%, 47%, 52%, 56%, 58%.

If you manage to kill the target while the spell is in effect, you'll be returned to the point in time you cast this spell and the target will be slain.

This spell splits the timeline. Attempting to use another spell that also splits the timeline while this effect is active will be unsuccessful.

The resistance penalty will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Cease to Exist

description: Directly manipulate the flow of time
name: timetravel

talents.info_text:
Pull a bolt of temporal energy back through time. The bolt will home in on your location, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 temporal damage to enemies, and reducing the cooldown of one chronomancy talent on cooldown by one turn per enemy hit.

The bolt gains 5% damage each time it moves and the damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Temporal Bolt

talents.info_text:
Creates a temporal echo in a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 around you. Affected targets will take 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 temporal damage, as well as up to 33%, 38%, 41%, 43%, 44% of the difference between their current life and max life as additional temporal damage.

The additional damage will be divided by the target's rank and the damage scales with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Echoes From The Past

talents.info_text: Transport yourself to a safe place for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.
talents.name: Temporal Reprieve

talents.info_text:
Inflicts 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 temporal damage. If your target survives, it may be removed from time for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Skip
